properties.areaDesc: Laurens, GA; Washington, GA; Wilkinson, GA; Johnson, GA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 1:45PM EST until February 14 at 3:40PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...
Oconee River near Penfield affecting Clarke...Greene and Oconee
Counties

Oconee River near Oconee affecting Johnson...Washington and
Wilkinson Counties

Oconee River near Dublin affecting Johnson...Laurens...Washington
and Wilkinson Counties

Oconee River near Mount Vernon affecting Montgomery...Treutlen and
Wheeler Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The Oconee River near Dublin.
* Until Friday afternoon.
* At 12 PM Tuesday the stage was 27.5 feet...and falling.
* Moderate flooding will continue.
* Flood stage is 21 feet.
* The river will continue to fall to below flood stage by late Friday
morning.
* At 27 feet...Significant flooding expands into the woodlands and
agricutural areas upstream and downstream from the gage on U.S.
Highway 80. The flood waters will be around 4 feet deep on Rex
Miller Road and Old River Lane. Several homes on these roads will
be under two feet of water. Also a few homes on River Ridge Road
will be flooded with a foot of water. Portions of the Riverview
Park Golf Course will be flooded.
